Class Methods

objectWithString:

Create a Foundation object from JSON string

+ (id)objectWithString:(NSString *)jsonString

Parameters

jsonString

the JSON NSString to convert

Return Value

A Foundation object, or nil if an error occurs.

Discussion

Note: Creating objects with this method defaults to NSJSONReadingMutableContainers options.

Declared In

NSJSONSerialization+UAAdditions.h

objectWithString:options:

Create a Foundation object from JSON string

+ (id)objectWithString:(NSString *)jsonString options:(NSJSONReadingOptions)opt

Parameters

jsonString

the JSON NSString to convert

opt

NSJSONReadingOptions

Return Value

A Foundation object, or nil if an error occurs.

Declared In

NSJSONSerialization+UAAdditions.h

objectWithString:options:error:

Create a Foundation object from JSON string

+ (id)objectWithString:(NSString *)jsonString options:(NSJSONReadingOptions)opt error:(NSError **)error

Parameters

jsonString

the JSON NSString to convert

opt

NSJSONReadingOptions

error

An NSError pointer for storing errors, if applicable.

Return Value

A Foundation object, or nil if an error occurs.

Declared In

NSJSONSerialization+UAAdditions.h

stringWithObject:

Converts a Foundation object to a JSON formatted NSString

+ (NSString *)stringWithObject:(id)jsonObject

Parameters

jsonObject

Foundation object to convert

Return Value

NSString formatted as JSON, or nil if an error occurs

Discussion

Note: Writing JSON strings with this method defaults to no NSJSONWritingOptions, and does not accept fragments.

Declared In

NSJSONSerialization+UAAdditions.h

stringWithObject:acceptingFragments:

Converts a Foundation object to a JSON formatted NSString

+ (NSString *)stringWithObject:(id)jsonObject acceptingFragments:(BOOL)acceptingFragments

Parameters

jsonObject

Foundation object to convert

acceptingFragments

YES if objects representing JSON value fragments are acceptable, NO otherwise.

Return Value

NSString formatted as JSON, or nil if an error occurs.

Discussion

Note: Writing JSON strings with this method defaults to no NSJSONWritingOptions.

Declared In

NSJSONSerialization+UAAdditions.h

stringWithObject:acceptingFragments:error:

Converts a Foundation object to a JSON formatted NSString

+ (NSString *)stringWithObject:(id)jsonObject acceptingFragments:(BOOL)acceptingFragments error:(NSError **)error

Parameters

jsonObject

Foundation object to convert

acceptingFragments

YES if objects representing JSON value fragments are acceptable, NO otherwise.

error

An NSError pointer for storing errors, if applicable.

Return Value

NSString formatted as JSON, or nil if an error occurs.

Discussion

Note: Writing JSON strings with this method defaults to no NSJSONWritingOptions.

Declared In
